title: Print, "Hakone Hotel", 20th century
markings: Stamp in purple ink, verso: LUIS LOPES DOS REIS / Trav. do Guarda-Joias, 22, 3.o E. / LISBOA-3 Portugal; stamp in green ink: G. SZABO / BUDAPEST V. / APÁCZI 5.
creditline: Museum purchase from Sarah Cooper-Hewitt Fund
description: Luggage label depicting buildings along a lake shore, most notably, a large white structure with rounded arch windows. A yellow Mt. Fuji looms in the background. Text across top: HAKONE HOTEL / HAKONE LAKE-SIDE, JAPAN; text in white, lower margin: ONLY 2 ½ HOURS FROM YOKOHAMA

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Hakone Hotel", 20th century.
20th century. Offset lithograph. Museum purchase from Sarah Cooper-Hewitt Fund. 1994-62-63.
